info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 11:45AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, central Silver Bow and southeastern Powell Counties through 1215 PM MST... At 1144 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from near Drummond to near Divide. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Roads may become quickly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Deer Lodge, Butte, Silver Bow, Walkerville, Warm Springs, Galen, Gregson Hot Springs, Garrison, Finn, Nissler, Brock Creek, Crackerville, Avon, Racetrack, Opportunity, Goldcreek, Blossburg, Ramsay, Janney and Newcomb. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 163 and 231. Highway 12 Garrison to MacDonald Pass between mile markers 0 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
